ComicInfo.Summary:
An unstoppable monster has been released, and Liesel Van Helsing is tasked with stopping it. However, a cunning adversary has been pulling strings from the distance, preventing Helsing from saving the day. Can Helsing do what must be done to save lives, or will she crumble when faces with the consequences of her own failure?

ComicInfo.Title: It's Alive!
